topics.body:
"@Shadow the Hedgehog":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556f91e06368724f17ac0300#post_556f91e06368724f17ac0300
[bq="Shadow the Hedgehog"]"@Princess Luna":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/556f907d6368723582d80300#post_556f907d6368723582d80300
Of aaaaaaaaaaall the thousands of users of from site... Quasar and Peregrine are the last humans that would be banned in Derpibooru that I can think.
[/bq]
Seriously? From what I saw of him, I'd have thought that Quasar would have been banned more often. But then, I would have also thought that some other people are perma-banned, when that's clearly not the case. Generally, I find the moderation on this site too relaxed. I was actually surprised when I learned that there _are_ perma-bans here.
